message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper discusses emotion recognition based on textual data, which falls under the domain of Natural Language Processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper also involves the use of Machine Learning techniques, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Learning) likely sub-categories. The paper also involves content-based classification, which falls under the domain of Information Retrieval (IR), making cs.IR a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the detection of emotions, which can be related to the domain of Cybernetics (CY), making it a possible sub-category.
